judges: Before Brown, Mbstrezat, Potter, Elkin and Stewart JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
For the reasons given in the opinion, ante, p. 103, the ordef of the court below discharging the rule to open judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Caldwell
(No. 2).
Argued Feb. 15, 1909.
Appeal, No. 32, Oct. T., 1909, by Walter Chess, from order of C. P. No. 2, Allegheny Co., July T., 1908, No. 178, discharging rule to open judgment in case of Commonwealth v. John Caldwell, Jr., et al.
Before Brown, Mbstrezat, Potter, Elkin and Stewart JJ.
Affirmed.
March 16, 1909:
